title: A week or so ago, I sent in a question regarding the support columns of the I140 bypass overpass over 74/76. Specifically why they had not been encased in concrete. Is this a new design or something that still needs to be done. I never received any response.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/10/support-columns-140-crosses-74-76-encased-concrete/
